Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Illinois Medical District.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
